SCRIPT.MSCRI:
:INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.HEADER.PARAM_VALIDATION
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Host" :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_WEBLOGIC_HOST#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Port" :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_WEBLOGIC_PORT#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Username" :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_WEBLOGIC_USERNAME#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Retire Gracefully" :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_WEBLOGIC_GRACEFULLY#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Application Name" :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_WEBLOGIC_APP_NAME#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Timeout" :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_WEBLOGIC_TIMEOUT#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Connect Protocol" :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_WEBLOGIC_USE_PROTOCOL#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Fail if application is stopped" :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_WEBLOGIC_FAIL_STOPPED#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Fail if application is missing" :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_WEBLOGIC_FAIL_MISSING#
